class.name: EditorVCSInterfaceGit
class.brief_description: A built-in version control plugin which provides [url=https://git-scm.com/]Git[/url] functionality.
class.description: This plugin provides basic [url=https://git-scm.com/]Git[/url] functionality from within the editor powered by [url=https://libgit2.org/]libgit2[/url] library. The "Commit" dock and "Version Control" bottom panel will automatically appear once the editor is launched. [b]Note:[/b] it may not be possible to use other VCS plugins at the moment.
